Bomin

Group (2017-present):
Golden Child until Aug 27, 2024

Introduction

Choi Bomin is a South Korean dancer, singer, and actor.

He debuted as a member of the boy group Golden Child under Woollim Entertainment, on August 28, 2017.

Choi Bomin made his acting debut in the second season of the web drama 'A-TEEN' in 2019. He then played in other series such as '18 Again' in 2020, and 'Shadow Beauty' in 2021.

From September 29, 2022, to February 13, 2023, he was on hiatus due to an incident where he was hit in the face with a golf club by another person while practicing for his individual schedule.

On August 27, 2024, Woollim Entertainment announced that Choi Bomin did not renew his contract and would be leaving the group and the agency.
